text: RRF may refer to: * Rapid reaction force, a military or police emergency unit * Raptor Research Foundation, US based ornithological organization * Ready Reserve Force, A fleet of reserve ships to be used by the Military Sealift Command when activated * Reed Reactor Facility, a nuclear reactor * Ribosome Recycling Factor, in protein synthesis * Risk reduction factor * Royal Regiment of Fusiliers, an infantry regiment of the British Army * Relentless Reckless Forever, seventh studio album of Finnish metal band Children of Bodom * Detroit Reentry Center, formerly Ryan Correctional Facility (has the code "RRF")
title: RRF
